QuestData.Title: A Hero Is Needed
QuestData.Description: It is not enough. A hero is needed. Our forces are overwhelmed as the Auchenai continue to grow in number.$B$B<Commander Ra'vaj looks at you.>$B$BWill you be the hero? Return to the field of battle and strike at their soldiers. Keep them occupied so that my scouts can get behind their lines and see what they are creating.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Ra'vaj at the Sha'tari Base Camp in the Bone Wastes of Terokkar Forest wants you to slay 12 Auchenai Initiates and 5 Auchenai Doomsayers.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done it, $n! Because of you, we have made a new discovery...
